Station Update - Sydenham

A new Metro concourse is being constructed on the northern end of Sydenham Station. 
While the concourse is being installed, please use the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. 
If you need help, please ask staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
https://transportnsw.info/alerts#/train
Station Update - Central

There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may mean using different stairs, escalators and lifts. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6063487

Hawkesbury Rd bus stop closures and diversions

From 8pm Friday 5 June, Hawkesbury Rd, Westmead will be one-way in a southbound direction between Darcy Rd and Hainsworth St. The following stops will be permanently closed:

∙ The Westmead Institute Hawkesbury Rd (214516)
∙ Westmead Hospital Hawkesbury Rd (214517)

The alternative stops are Westmead Children's Hospital Hawkesbury Rd (214515) or Darcy Rd after Hawkesbury Rd (214518).

Temporary changes to overnight light rail services between Central and The Star

As a result of the latest directives from the Australian Government around public gatherings, the L1 Dulwich Hill overnight light rail services operating from 11pm (midnight on Friday) to 6am between Central Grand Concourse and The Star are suspended in both directions.

These temporary service changes are in place until further notice.

Use Trip Planner for alternative transport.

Trackwork may affect your travel

Friday 9 to Sunday 11 July

∙ From 10.55pm Friday, no trackwork scheduled on the metro, but trackwork on the T1 North Shore Line may affect how you travel.
∙ If you are travelling to the City please change at Epping, not Chatswood, for a direct train via the T9 Northern Line.


∙ From 8pm on Sunday, buses replace all metro services between Tallawong and Chatswood.
∙ Buses also replace T1 North Shore Line trains between Gordon and Wynyard.
∙ If you are travelling to or from the City please change at Epping, not Chatswood, for direct T9 Northern Line trains to or from Central.
∙ Plan your trip before you travel for up-to-date information.

Bus routes
11M: Tallawong, then all stations to Chatswood and return
12M: Tallawong, then all stations to Epping, then North Ryde, Chatswood and return

L2 Randwick Line and L3 Kingsford Line temporary service changes

From Monday 12 July to Wednesday 14 July, L2 Randwick Line and L3 Kingsford Line light rail services will not run each nightly from 8pm to 1am, due to planned maintenance works. Each night:

∙ From 8pm to 9pm, services will only run between Central Chalmers Street and Randwick or Juniors Kingsford; services will not run between Central Chalmers Street and Circular Quay.
∙ From 9pm to 1am, all services will not run between Circular Quay and Randwick or Juniors Kingsford.

Use alternative transport as follows:

∙ Trains or walking between Central Chalmers Street and Circular Quay.
∙ Replacement buses between Central Chalmers Street and Randwick or Juniors Kingsford.

Replacement buses will run every 7 to 10 minutes, see the news story for replacement stop locations. The L2 Randwick Line and L3 Kingsford Line will resume daily from 5am to 8pm. The L1 Dulwich Hill Line will continue to run as per normal schedule.
Normal full light rail services will resume at 5am Thursday 15 July.
Please allow extra travel time and use the Trip Planner or check travel alerts to see if you travel is affected.
